title: pro_cessed
details: A college project developed with a partner over a month. Topic was about "looking into the future". I contributed with programming, Unity implementation, UI/UX, SFX, and design. Networked multiplayer is hard!!

title: deliveralot
details: Developed over a semester in a group of 4, deliveralot is a college project based on the idea of "advergames", where we chose the South African company "takealot". I was responsible for programming (including Unity implementation), UI/UX design, and overall game design (not level design). We made it to the Loeries finals in 2025!

title: Daring Damsel
details: Daring Damsel was created in a group of 3 for a provided personality type as a topic. I was in charge of programming, Unity implementation and UX design.

title: Canvas Conundrum
details: Canvas Conundrum was created in a group of 5 for my college game jam. We were instructed to continue development with extra time (due dates). I was behind programming, Unity implementation and UX design.
